title: GelesFinance
author: GelesFinance
created_time: May 11, 2022, 08:44:42 AMLast edit: June 16, 2022, 12:46:26 PM by GelesFinance
content: Geles bounty campaignThe main goal of the Geles bounty campaign is to build and stimulate the platform's cryptocommunity. For this purpose 200,000 GLE tokens are allocated as rewards for active members of the community. The bounty campaign is conducted on the following platforms: Twitter, Telegram and other thematic blogs and websites.Period of the campaign: May 15 - July 31, 2022.GelesFinance announce https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5398127The rules and requirements for participants1. Subscribe to all following social media (Necessarily): Twitter https://twitter.com/GelesFinanceTelegram channel https://t.me/Geles_NewsTelegram group https://t.me/Geles_Chat 2. Please submit this form https://forms.gle/7DAwitsGVHYnPDRq9;3. Twitter:3.1. Actions & Rewards:Tweet about Geles (no more than once per 12 hours) and get 0,6 GLE per tweet;Comment any tweet (no more than once per 12 hours) and get 0,3 GLE per comment;Retweet a pinned message (no more than once per 3 days) and get 0,3 GLE per retweet.3.2. Requirements:An account must be older than 3 months;Must have at least 500 followers;No spam!.¬†4. Telegram:4.1. Actions & Rewards:For your chennals. Post about Geles and linking to the site www.geles.finance (no more than once per 12 hours) and get 3 GLE per post;For Geles chennal. Comment to any post (no more than 1 time in 6 hours) and get 0,2 GLE per comment;Geles chat activity. Ask questions in chat, and etc. (at least 10 messages per day) and get 0,5 GLE per task;4.2. Requirements:Must have at least 3500 followers for chennal;No spam!.¬†5. Blogs/Articles/Reviews:5.1. Actions & Rewards:Write an article/review/post and get 7 GLE per action. You can public different and unique content 10 times on one place.¬†5.2. Requirements:Domain age from 6 months;From 100 visitors per day;Content from 700 characters excluding spaces;www.geles.finance link and one of the link to social channels, networks;No spam!.¬†6. Video content:6.1. Actions & Rewards:Describe Geles platform and it's features and get 200-400 GLE per action. The value of the award depends on the quantity and quality of the audience¬†6.2. Requirements:Minimum resolution 1080p;From 100 visitors per day;Minimal Youtube length 2 min;Minimal other platform length 30 sec;www.geles.finance link and one of the link to social channels, networks;No spam!.¬†Bounty sign up https://forms.gle/7DAwitsGVHYnPDRq9¬†Bounty stat www.shorturl.at/ghoA8Stacks are updated and payments are made every seventh day starting from May 15.
